articles.description:
RT Ethereum: The Infinite Garden
The merge is only hours away! We have film crews around the world, but we can't be everywhere at once, so we're asking for your help documenting this historic moment. We'd love if you can record your live reactions and celebrations whether at a watch party or at home with coffee

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re and @getP3RKS is unlocking new ways for DAOs to reward their top contributors 🫂
Helping DAOs attract and retain the folks needed to build the future. 
Operatoooors assemble 👉
P3RKS: ✨ P3RKS is live on @gitcoin GR15 ✨

We believe DAOs are the future of work. To make that dream a reality, DAOs need more ways to reward their top contributors and compete for talent.
P3RKS seeks to make that possible 📜
 https://gitcoin.co/grants/7734/p3rks-rewards-for-dao-contributors

articles.description:
Re @edenprotocolxyz is creating the talent coordination protocol for DAOs and they're already making 🌊s in our community. 
After all, it's all about coordination -
eden: We at @edenprotocolxyz just shipped our first application for @gitcoin grant round 15!✨
Eden is solving a problem of talent coordination in DAOs, creating matches between people & opportunities using AI.🤩
Learn more & consider donating❤️
#gr15 #gitcoin
 https://gitcoin.co/grants/7285/eden-protocol

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @womenbuildweb3 is already changing lives, no seriously...
Just check out the latest update🤯 
An amazing team creating the rails for women/nb folks to accelerate their education and impact in web3.
Cami (🐱, ⛽️): The @womenbuildweb3 grant is live for GR15 🎉
Since GR14 we’ve shippped the most up-to-date course on building dapps:
- 2000+ students 
- 40+ hours of live support
- free
Next we’re deploying $130K to projects led by women/nb engineers
Contribute here:
 https://gitcoin.co/grants/6100/women-build-web3-developer-accelerator

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT EPNS | $PUSH
Traditional finance has systems to push messages to end-users about financial events & keep them up-to-date.
There’s an apparent learning curve when using #DeFi apps & not having a way to support & alert. But how do we do this in a decentralized manner? https://medium.com/ethereum-push-notification-service/loan-update-high-utilization-or-low-liquidity-please-check-your-position-fe917fe7c193
